original_title: Pike on the Fly: In Pursuit of the Water Wolf
overview: Join master fishing guide Barry Reynolds as he shares insider fly-fishing techniques for catching truly monster northern pike in this exhilarating program shot on location in some of the wildest waters in America. In heart-pounding footage, you'll witness Reynolds take some extraordinary pike, while a bonus section explains the tools of the angler's trade, including flies, leaders and other tackle.
title: Pike on the Fly: In Pursuit of the Water Wolf
